content:
Art. 4.130. 
Retention period
The Royal Federation of Belgian Notaries keeps the registration data, with the date of registration, until thirty years after the death of the person whose data is kept.
The Royal Federation of Belgian Notaries keeps the data relating to consultations made in the register, namely the identification data of the person who accessed the register, the identification data of the person about whom a search was made, the time of the search and the reason for the search. The data is kept for up to ten years after access. In the event of a dispute, this period is suspended until all avenues of appeal have been exhausted.
